Experience

Kalahari Plains Camp is situated in a remote part of the Central Kalahari Game Reserve & offers some of the best summer wildlife opportunities on the continent.
This 5million hectares reserve is the largest conservation area in the country & one of the largest in the world. The Central Kalahari Game Reserve is home to the legendary Kalahari black-maned lion & some of the world’s best cheetah viewing.

Stay

The camp is built on the edge of an immense pan where beautiful views can be enjoyed & lazy days can be spent.
It comprises 8 en-suite canvas tents, each kitted out with a private sleep-out above from which to enjoy Africa’s starry skies. One of these tents is a 2-bedroom family unit, with 2 bedrooms & 2 en-suite bathrooms.
The main area consists of a lounge & dining area as well as a sparkling swimming pool & deck area. Kalahari Plains Camp is a 100% solar-powered camp, so temperatures throughout the lodge are comfortable.

Activities

Activities include open 4x4 game drives & walks with Bushmen – a unique experience to the Central Kalahari Game Reserve. Sleeping out under the stars is also a must!

During the rainy summer months, between November & April, the desert truly comes to life. Short grasses sprout in the pan systems & riverbeds, attracting thousands of plains game such as springbok & gemsbok.
Wildebeest, steenbok & red hartebeest also make their way towards the pans – with lion, leopard, cheetah & jackal following shortly.

subfolders.title: Deception Valley Lodge
subfolders.description: Deception Valley Lodge enjoys a remote & isolated desert location on the northern-eastern boundary of the Central Kalahari Game Reserve on one of the largest privately-owned game conservancies in Botswana.   On this staggering 43,000 hectares of pristine bushveld, guests will have the rare opportunity to meet the local San Bushmen of the Naru-speaking tribe, & explore this remarkable environment on foot, while their Bushman guide teaches them about their hunting & survival skills.  Learning about the culture of the San people, who over centuries have adapted their lives to survive in the most inhospitable environment, is a unique experience Deception Valley Lodge has to offer.

subfolders.title: Dinaka Camp
subfolders.description: Dinaka Camp is located on an exclusive conservancy in the northern edge of the Kalahari Game Reserve & home to one of the most unique bio-diversities in Southern Africa. Home to the Kalahari lion, springbok, oryx & brown hyena, this ever-changing desert landscape never fails to impress.

subfolders.title: Tau Pan Camp
subfolders.description: The vast & unspoiled Central Kalahari Game Reserve is the largest sand basin in the world & home to the beautiful Tau Pan Camp.   The camp has a unique location overlooking a salt pan & the endless Kalahari horizon, giving it a unique sense of space that is different to any other area in Botswana.
